SoundManager 2 Template Example

This is a basic template for adding SoundManager to your page.

This page includes the SM2 script and makes a call to initialise the library. If you prefer to have the library wait for window.onload() before trying to initialise, simply remove the inline soundManager.go() call from this page.

To disable the debug output, refer to the source of this page which sets soundManager.debugMode to false.
